attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Request that the Government show some appreciation to the forgotten people, the single workers of this country who pay tax to keep certain groups of people in the UK in cigarettes, alcohol ,sky TV, cars and free housing. Not only single mothers and married couples deserve financial rebates from the chancellor, if you can't afford to support your own kids don't have them and definately don't expect single people and people who have decided not to have children to support "your" off spring.
